text: The ASEAN Declaration or Bangkok Declaration is the first document of the Association of Southeast Asian Nations. It was signed in Bangkok on 8 August 1967 by the first five ASEAN members, Indonesia, Malaysia, Philippines, Singapore, and Thailand. The date is now celebrated as ASEAN Day. == References == Category:1967 Category:1960s treaties Category:ASEAN Category:1967 in Asia Category:History of Indonesia
title: ASEAN Declaration
